Package processing.embroider

Class PEmbroiderGraphics.BCircle

java.lang.Object
processing.embroider.PEmbroiderGraphics.BCircle
Enclosing class:
PEmbroiderGraphics
public class PEmbroiderGraphics.BCircle
extends java.lang.Object
Class for a bounding circle. The bounding circle is not the minimal bounding circle for now. It's just some bounding circle. It works well enough for current use cases, but we might implement minimal bounding circle in the future

  • Constructor Details

    • BCircle

      public BCircle​(float _x, float _y, float _r)
      Constructor that makes a bounding circle from center and radius
      Parameters:
      _x - x coordinate of center
      _y - y coordinate of center
      _r - radius

    • BCircle

      public BCircle​(java.util.ArrayList<PVector> poly)
      Constructor that makes a bounding circle from a bunch of points
      Parameters:
      poly - a bunch of points

    • BCircle

      public BCircle​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<PVector>> poly, int whatever)
      Constructor that makes a bounding circle from a bunch of bunches of points
      Parameters:
      polys - a bunch of bunches of points
      whatever - literally pass in whatever. It is necessary because of type erasure in Java, which basically means Java cannot tell the difference between List and List> in arguments, so a difference in number of arguments is required for overloading to work
